definition: The practice or set of actions aimed at preserving and safeguarding the natural environment, including the protection of ecosystems, prevention of pollution, and conservation of resources. It is commonly used to refer to efforts and measures taken to ensure environmental protection and sustainability.

examples.german: Umweltschutz ist wichtig für die Zukunft.
examples.english: Environmental protection is important for the future.

examples.german: Wir sollten uns alle für den Umweltschutz engagieren.
examples.english: We should all get involved in environmental protection.

examples.german: Der Umweltschutz ist ein globales Anliegen.
examples.english: Environmental protection is a global concern.

examples.german: Es gibt viele Organisationen, die sich dem Umweltschutz widmen.
examples.english: There are many organizations dedicated to environmental protection.
Environmental protection measures can protect nature.
